text: The Whole Year is Christmas () is a 1960 Argentine fantasy movie directed by Román Viñoly Barreto and starring Raúl Rossi, Olga Zubarry, Carlos Estrada, Nelly Meden, Leonardo Favio, Ricardo Castro Ríos, Mabel Kerr, Enrique Guarnero. ==Other websites== * Category:1960 movies Category:1960s fantasy movies Category:Argentine fantasy movies Category:Christmas movies Category:Movies directed by Román Viñoly Barreto
title: The Whole Year is Christmas
